De cauterizacio de titillic que es le cap del ajutori.	Regarding the cauterization of the bump, which is at the top of the aide:
Quan le cap del ajutori es dislocat per causa de humiditatz lubricas e no es fermat en la hora del sieu retornament deves la sua dislocacio entro que sia a lu aquo costuma de retornar, e aprop per un petit movement es deslocat ayssi que s’endeve, ayssi cum nos havem testificat, lahoras cove que primieyrament redusiscas la dislocacio, e aprop le malaute sia reversat sobre le sieu dos o sobre le latz sa; e aprop eleva la codena la qual es en la partida dedintz del citillic a las partidas desus am les ditz de la tua ma sinistra, si la junctura es dislocada a las partidas dedintz.	When the head of the aide is dislocated due to slippery moisture and it is not held in place during its realignment, you must ensure its dislocation so that it returns to its usual position; and then with a slight movement, it can be pushed back into place, as we have testified. In such cases, first reduce the dislocation, then place the patient on their back or side; next, lift your elbow which is below the bump towards the areas above it using the fingers of your left hand if the joint is dislocated inwards.
E aprop igneys le cauteri havent dos caps; e aquesta es la forma de lu:	And now ignite the cautery with two heads; this is its form:
E aprop cauteriza la codena entro que penetre aquela entro al autre latz; e vindra la figura de cauterizacio lahoras de iv caps cauteris.	Now cauterize the vein until it penetrates that point on the other side; the figure of cauterization will then be formed by two heads of the cautery.
e so aquel subtils segon la quantitat de tenta; e aquesta es la forma de lu:	Make it subtle according to the amount of flesh that will be cauterized; this is its form:
E alcunas veguadas es ajustat segon aquest comte i per que son les cauteris .viii.	And sometimes it is adjusted according to the amount of flesh and because there are eight (8) cauterizations.
E aprop pausa sobre le cauteri porys cuytz am sal, e aprop fay adherir le malaute a trenquilitat, e lo membre no sia maugut per alcun temps entro que sia confortat.	Then place on the cautery some saltpetre powder (salt), and now ensure that the patient is at rest; let him not move his affected limb for some time until it has healed.
E si la dislocacio es a las partidas desus e tart es fayt aquo, lahoras cauteriza sobre le muscle am cauteri clavilh o am motz cauteris puntan, quar la junctura es confermada e la humiditat es romauguda e le malaute es sanat.	If the dislocation is of a long-standing nature and this has been done to him (the patient), now cauterize over the muscle with a fixed or movable pointed cautery, for the joint will be made solid and moistness reduced as healing takes place.

De cauterizacio del stomac.	De cauterizacio del stomac.
Quan veno en l’estomac freg e motas humiditatz entro que aquel extrazo de la sua compleccio e so multiplicatz raumases a lu, e si tu continuas las manieyras de curacio e no confereyso, lahoras cove que le malaute sia sobre le sieu dos ressupinat, e extenda las suas mas e las suas coysas, e aprop cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris: an un cauteri dejos le pietz per la quantitat d’un dit am cauteri clavilh, e am dos cauteris dejos del dos costatz del cauteri, entro que vengua la figura de cauteri triangulada; e elonga entre els que no sian ajustatz que faran poyredura.	When cold and moist humors enter the stomach and disrupt its natural balance, causing strange changes within it, if you continue with these treatment methods without consulting an expert, then let the patient lie on their back, extend their arms and legs, and proceed to cauterize in three places: place one pointed cautery under each foot for a finger's length, and two more under each side of the navel, forming a triangular shape; make sure they are not too close together so as to avoid burning.
E si la profunditat del cauteri la quantitat de les dos terses de la grocesa de la codena.	And if the depth of the cautery is equivalent to about two-thirds of the thickness of a rope.
E sia la figura del cauteri segon aquesta forma ses addicio, E si vols, cauteriza am gran cauteri en le mieg loc del estomac segon aquesta forma; et aquest sia un cauteri segon la forma de cercle segon aquesta forma:	And the shape of the cautery should be according to this form, which is an addition to the previous one. If you wish, you can use a large circular cautery on the middle part of the stomach with this shape: (insert circle shape here).
E sia cauterizat l’estomac punctan ad aquel que de aquest cauteri es spaventat: e es que tu senhes sobre l’estomac punt segon la quantitat que voles am tenta, e aprop cauteriza aquel am cauteri en les puntz; e aprop cura aquel am la curacio qu’es precedita entro que sia sanat.	You should cauterize the stomach by pointing to where this type of cautery is used: you can mark the stomach with a needle in the desired amount, and then cauterize those points using the cautery; finally, treat it as instructed previously until fully healed.

De perforacio de apostema del fietge am cauteri.	De perforacio de apostema del fietge am cauteri.
Quan endeve excitura o apostema en le fietge e voles saber si aquel apostema es en le carn del fietge o en la tunica de lu, lahoras si es en la carn del fietge, le malaute atrobo gravitat e dolor ses acuitat.	When a tumor starts in the kidney and you want to know if it is located in the flesh of the kidney or its membrane, then when it's in the flesh of the kidney, the patient becomes seriously ill and pain increases.
E si es en la tunica del fietge, am la dolor es acuitat gran e vezes que ja afatiguatz les metges la cura de lu.	And if it is in the membrane of the kidney, great pain occurs which sometimes tires out the doctors trying to cure him.
Donc cove que·l malaute sia enversat sobre la sieua cervit; e aprop senha le loc de l’apostema am tenta; e aprop igneys le cauteri le quel es asemblat a rag, la forma del qual a precedit en l’autra pagina.	Then have the patient turned onto his abdomen; and next expose the site of the tumor by pulling aside (the skin); then apply an iron cautery made to resemble wool as described on the previous page.
E cauteriza am aquel i cauteri entro que tota la codena sia comborida, entro que pervengua al ciphac, entro qu’en yesca sania.	Cauterize with that iron until the entire cord is burnt down, before reaching the capsule, before it heals.
E aprop cura aquel per curacio dels autres apostemas entro que sia sanat.	Then cure him by treating the other tumors until he is healed.
E no cove que de aquesta forma de cauteri use sino aquel del qual le estudi en l’art de medicina es prolonguat, e en las mas del qual motas malautias an conogut; mays aquest am esperiment alcunas veguadas sia ardit sobre aquesta operacio, mays empero leyssa aquela deves nos, e es miels.	And one need not use this form of cautery other than the one that medical art teaches and which experience has shown to be useful for many diseases; but you must attempt this operation with some boldness because it is gentle among us and better.

De la cauterizacio de la melsa.	On the cauterization of the mouth." 
Quan tu curas la malautia de la melsa am aquo que havem dit de la curacio en la divisio e no confereys la tua curacio, lahoras cauteri en lu es segon tres manieras, las quals totas son dreyturieras, de las quals la una es que fassas tres cauteris o quatre linhan segon la longitut de la melsa segon la figura dels cauteris del fietge, la figura dels quals ha precedit.	When you treat the disease of the navel with what we have said about treatment in previous sections and it does not respond to your treatment, then cauterization on them is done in three ways, all of which are correct; one of these [ways] is that you make three or four cauteries [along] the length of the navel according to the shape of the liver's cauteries, the shapes of which preceded.
E sia entre quascun cauteri la grossetut d’un dit o un pauc mes, e la manieyra del cauteri sia la manieyra la qual havem dita en le cauteri del fietge engualment.	And between each cautery, leave a space equal to the thickness of a finger or slightly more; let the shape of this cautery be similar to that which we described in the case of the liver's cautery as well.
E no compremas la tua ma am le cauteri; e le malaute sia eves sobre lo sieu dos.	Do not press your hand on the cauteries, let the patient lie on his back instead.
E es autra manieyra de cauterizar, so es que tu igniscas le cauteri haventz dos vertimentz, la qual causa havem dita en le capitol de dislocacio del muscle, e elava la codena la qual es en le endreyt de la melsa la hon perve le jazer del malaute sinistre.	There is another way of cauterization, that you light the cautery with two wicks as we have mentioned in the chapter on muscle dislocation; raise his thigh which is near the navel and place the patient's left side down.
E sia la tua elevacio am la qual elevas la codena segon la longuesa del cors, per que sian faytz cauteris segon la latitut del cos.	And let your elevation of the thigh be according to the length of the body so that you can make the cauteries along the width of the body accordingly.
E aprop entromet les dos vernimentz, ignitz mot, en aquel entro que am aquels penetres la codena de la autra part.	Certainly! Here is a translation of your provided text into English: 
E aprop extrayt le cauteri; e donc son faytz quatre cauteris.	Then extract the cautery; thus, four cauterizations are performed.
E si voys, cauteriza am cauteri havent tres vernimentz.	And you will cauterize with a three-pointed cautery.
E aprop tu cura le cauteri pus que aia laysat de getar brac per trops jorns, quar mays es comferent que las autras causas precedentz en la curacio. De cauterizacio de ydropici.	Concerning the cauterization of hydropsy (edema)." 
Cauteri no catz en ydropici sino en alcinte3 propriament.	Cauteri is not used in hydropsy but properly in alkindi.
Quan tu curas le ydropic am las manieyras de curacio las quals havem ditas en la divisio e no confereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que aquel cauterizes am quatre cauteris en le cercuit del embelic e am un cauteri sobre l’estomac, e am autre cauteri sobre le fietge, e am autre cauteri sobre la melsa, e am dos cauteris entre les spondils del dos, e un cauteri en lo dreyt del pietz, e am autre cauteri sobre l’estomac.	When you treat the hydroptic with the methods of cure which we have mentioned in the division and your cure does not work, then it is necessary to cauterize with four cauteries around the navel, one cautery over the stomach, another cautery over the liver, another cautery over the spleen, two cauteries between the vertebrae of the back, one cautery on the right foot, and another cautery over the stomach.
E la quantitat de la profunditat del cauteri sia propdana a la spicitut de la codena.	The amount of depth for the cauterization should be proportional to the sharpness of the probe.
E aprop layssa le cauteri ubert per so que gete brac per lonc temps.	Then leave the cautery open for some time, so that the arm becomes weak.
E no evacuas le malaute de curacio aprop le cauteri am aquo que cove per que sian agreguadas a lu doas entencios, e sira festinada a lu am ajutori sanacio.	And do not take the patient away from treatment before the cautery with something that is needed to add two intentions and help them heal faster.
La forma del cauteri am lo qual es cauterizat lo ventre sia clavilh segon que la forma de aquel es desus precedent, e es aquel am le qual es cauterizat le dos sia olivar segon qu’es precedent a la sua forma.	The shape of the cautery for abdominal cauterization should be nail-like according to its previous form, and it should be olive-like for back cauterization according to its previous form.

Capitol .xxxv.	Chapter 35.
De cauterizacio de atheyl aprop la abscizio de lor.	About the cauterization of hernia before their excision.
Quan tu abscindes atheyl, lahoras tu igneys le cauteri que es asemblat a ray.	When you excise the hernia, you ignite a cautery that has been assembled like a ray (star).
Aprop entremet aquel ignit en aquel atheyl abscis, e ultima la tieua ma entro que pervengua le cauteri al orifici de la vena de la qual ve la sanc.	Then immerse that ignited cautery into the excised hernia, and finally place your hand over it to prevent the cautery from reaching the vein's opening through which blood flows.
E fay aquo una vetz o doas, quar si achieyl son trops, lahoras cauteriza quascun de lor segon que havem recontat, e aprop cura aquels am aquo que confereys a lor dels enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Do this once or twice, for if there are many of them (hernias), then cauterize each one as we have described earlier, and then treat them with ointments until they heal properly.
E si cauterizas am gran cauteri sobre alquatin, es mays derier en juvament.	And if you cauterize (a hernia) with a large cautery on anyone, it is better to do so later rather than sooner.
Capitol .xxxvi.	Chapter 36.
De cauterizacio de fistolas que son faytas en la natura derie en las partidas de lu.	On the cauterization of fistulas that arise naturally in different parts of the body.
Quan la natura no obeziys a la obra la qual havem recomtada en son loc, e·l pacient es espaventat per aquo, sia sanat am cauteri.	When nature does not obey the work we have described in its place (the body), and the patient is frightened by it, treat him with a cautery.
Donc quan ad alcun ve fistola en la natura derier, e es antiquada, corro sania de lu e humiditatz corrompudas, e donc aquo que es pus digne que cove es que proes aquela am tenta subtil, e aprop conoys la quantitat de la profunditat de lu am la devant dita tenta. Aprop igneys le cauteri que es semblant a ray.	Aprop igneys le cauteri que es semblant a ray.

E itera sobre aquela le cauteri entro que sian comburitz aquels cors corrumputz tost una veguada o dos o tres, segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat.	Repeat the process of applying the cautery until those corrupt bodily parts are burned away once or twice or three times, according to how much is needed.

E aprop cura le loc entro que sia sanat.	Then treat the area until it has healed.
E si le loc es sigillat, e so abscindidas de lu las materias, e roman ayssi per lonc temps, lahoras sapias que ja es curat entierament.	And if the wound is sealed, and all matter has been removed from it, and it remains that way for a long time, then you may know that it is fully healed.
E si las materias no so de lu ostadas, lahoras sapias que es penetrant o en le preon de lu os corromput, o cays aquo de aquelas causas de las quals vindra rememoracio en son loc.	If the matter is not being expelled from it, then know that it either still penetrates or there is corruption within its depth; or this may be due to other causes which we shall recall at a later time.

De cauterizacio dels ronhos.	De cauterizacio dels ronhos." translates to "Regarding the cauterization of sores." or "On the treatment of ulcers by cautery." 
Quan en les ronhos endeve dolor per freg o per grossa ventozitat, e per aysso le coyt del malaute es amermat, lahoras cove que cauterizes aquel sobre les ronhos am cauteri sobre quascun ronho am cauteri clavilh del qual precesic la rememoracio.	When there is pain in the stomach due to colic or severe flatulence, and because of this, the patient's condition worsens, it is appropriate to cauterize that area on the abdomen with a pointed cautery for each affected spot, which requires further explanation.
E fort leu cauterizam am le segon un petit dejos, per que vindran tres cauteris liniatz, e donc siran mays deriers en juvament.	And it is likely that we will cauterize with the second one a little below, so that three linear cauteries will result, and thus they will be larger behind in relief.

De cauterizacio de la mayra.	On the cauterization of hemorrhoids." 
Quan veno en la mayra freg e humiditatz, e per aysso es prohibida enpreignacio, e son corrompudas las mestruas de lu, e es tardada la provocacio de lor, e accideys dolor deves le haveniment de lor, lahoras cove que·l loc sia cauterizat am tres cauteris en le circuit del ombelic, ayssi cum havem dit en le cauteri de la vesica; e am cauteri sobre le loc pus dejos del dos, o am dos cauteris, e sia le cauteri clavilh.	When the pain occurs in the worst cold and humid weather, and pregnancy is prohibited due to this condition, as their menstrual cycle is disrupted, delayed, and painful, it is necessary that the area be cauterized with three cauteries around the navel, as we have mentioned before for bladder issues; or use two cauteries below the back, and let these cauteries be pointed.
Capitol .xl.	Chapter 40.
De cauterizacio de la dislocacio de l’anqua.	On the cauterization for dislocation of the ankle. 
Quan humiditatz moucozas so efundudas a la partida de la anqua, e so faytas causas del yssiment del sieu loc, e senhal de lu es que la coyssa es prolonguada sobre l’autre quan so comparadas entre lor.	When mucus-like moisture infiltrates the region of the hip joint and has caused its displacement from its original position, a sign of this is that one side is longer than the other when they are compared together.
E le loc de la dislocacio es atrobat en lu quays boyt.	The location of the dislocation is found in which bone?
Adonc cove que cauterizas le malaute sobre la partida de la anqua de lu am cauteri a sercle semblant, pus que tu auras senhat am tenta en le cercuit de la partida ayssi cum es revolguda, e per so que la partida caia el mieg loc del cercle.	Therefore, you must cauterize the patient in the area around their hip with a circular cautery, as you will have marked it by feeling for the circumference of the joint, and ensure that the joint falls within the center of the circle.
E sia le cauteri del qual precedit la forma en la cauterizacio del estomac.	And is the cautery which precedes it in shape to that used for cauterizing the stomach?
E si aquest cauteri no es a tu present, lahoras cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris am cauteri olivar gran.	And if this cautery is not available to you, then cauterize it with three large olive-shaped cauteries instead.
E sia fayt le cauteri segon la quantitat de la ispicitut de tota la codena; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	The cautery is performed according to the severity of the entire condition; then treat it until it has fully healed.
Capitol .xli.	Chapter 41. 
De cauterizacio de la vena sciatica.	De cauterizacio de la vena sciatica.
Quan dolor ve en la partida de anqua, e so causa de lu freg et humiditatz, le malaute es curat am aquo que havem dit e no confereys, e aquo es antiquat, lahoras cove que tu lacses le malaute de humors grosses am pillulas fetidas o am pillulas artificials o semblantz; e aprop cauteriza aquel.	When pain occurs in the region of the hip and is caused by moisture or coldness, the patient can be cured with what we have mentioned earlier without any harm, which has been practiced since ancient times: treat the patient's excessive humors with foul-smelling pills or artificial ones; then cauterize that area.
E la manieyra del cauteri en aquela es segon dos manieyras: o cauteri am medicinas comburentz, o cauteri am foc.	The method of cauterization in this case is done in two ways: either with burning medicines or with fire.
Sira segon dos manieyras scientas, de las quals es la una que cauterizes aquel sobre la partida de l’ancha de lu am tres cauteris triangulatz segon aquesta forma; e fay am aquels bona profunditat.	There are two known methods, one of which involves cauterizing the hip area with three triangular-shaped cauteries arranged like this; make sure to go deep enough.
E sia le spazi le qual es entre cascun cauteri la quantitat de la grossitut del dit e si le cauteri olivar o gran.	The space between each cautery should be the width of a finger, and the cauteries themselves can be either olive-sized or larger.
Mays alcunas veguadas sia le cauteri sobre le mieg loc sobre le cap de l’anquan per que son quatre cauteris.	Sometimes, the cauteries may be placed over the middle part of the hip joint; in this case, there will be four cauteries.
E si vols, cauteriza am le cercle del qual es precesida la forma en la cauterizacio de la dislocacio de l’anqua, la i que sia cercle continent e comburey la ispicitut de tota la codena.	You can also use a circular shape that precedes the form used in hip dislocation cauterization; it should encompass and burn away all of the affected flesh.
E aquesta es la manieyra de cauteri in ciatiqua quan dolor es adherent al anqua e no es estenduda entro a la coyssa.	And this is the method of cauterization for sciatica when pain adheres to the hip and has not spread into the thigh.
Mays si es estenduda entro a la coyssa, lahoras cauteriza aquel am dos cauteris sobre la coyssa sobre le loc al qual envireys le malaute que es la dolor; e am un cauteri sobre la cavilha per quatre ditz un pauc deves la part cilvestra.	But if it has spread into the thigh, then cauterize it with two cauteries on the thigh over the area where the patient feels the pain; and with one cautery on the calf for four times slightly below the popliteal region.
E si le cauteri cutellar, e sia la profunditat del cauteri segon la quantitat de la ispicitut de la codena.	If the cautery is cup-shaped, make the depth of the cautery according to the intensity of the pain.
E si le malaute envireys que la dolor es estenduda entro al loc prop les ditz des pes, lahoras cauteriza aquel aqui on envireys am cauteri per tres puntz o quatre o mays si indigeys de aquel.	And if the patient feels that the pain has spread into the area above the ankles, then cauterize it where they feel the pain with cauteries for three or four points or more as may be necessary.
E si le malaute envireys dolor esser dejos le donolh ves la coyssa, lahoras cauteriza aquel aqui am un cauteri cutellar.	And if the patient feels pain below the thigh, then cauterize it with a cup-shaped cautery there.
E guarda te en tota cauterizacio que no ultimes am le cauteri en tant que comburas nervi o gran arceria, e que per aquo a tu es sobre le malaute mal noccument o contraccio.	And take care in all cauterizations not to finish with the cautery if you burn nerves or major arteries, which would cause severe harm or contraction to the patient.
E yeu ja e vist un e autre de aquels les quals cauterizero sobre la cavilha e ultimero en la cauterizacio, e la cama foc inflada entro que la tumor aconseguit lo pe, e foc perforat e corromput tot le pe.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E aprop accidic fort solucio de ventre, e aprop aquo la mort.	And then there is a strong discharge from the stomach, which leads to death.
E si la dolor es en dos partidas ensemps cauteriza quascuna segon aquesta manieyra.	And if the pain is in two places, cauterize each area accordingly using this method.
E diysero les savis alcus en la cauterizacio de anqua cauteri del qual aquesta es la manieyra: fay semblant a cercle de ferr del qual le cercuit sia la maytat de un palm; e sia deves le sieu orrifici segon la grossesa de un os de datil o mens un pauc.	And the wise men said about the water cautery, this is its method: make it similar to an iron ring with a circumference of half a palm's width; and let its opening be as wide as a date stone or slightly less.
E dedintz aquel cercle sia un autre tertz; e sia le spazi le qual es entre lor la quantitat del notz del pous; e sian aquels cercles ubertz de dos partidas; e sia la longitut de aquels cays un notz o dos notz, e fay en aquels margue de ferr decentment apparelhat en les cercles; e aquesta es la forma de lu:	Inside this ring, put another one-third of its size; let the space between them be equal to the width of your big toe; and these rings should have openings on two sides. Make the length of the rings either the length or twice the length of your little finger. Craft an iron rim appropriately shaped to fit around the circles. This is how it's formed:
Aprop sia ignit en le foc entro que s’enrogesisca e gete scintillas, e aprop sia pausat sobre la partida del anqua, le malaute colcat sobre le latz sa.	Then ignite it in the fire until it reddens and emits sparks; then place it on the affected area while the patient lies down on their side.
E donc cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris redontz en una veguada.	And thus, cauterize it with three circular cauteries in one go.
E aprop layssa aquel per tres jorns; aprop emplastre aquel am boder e layssa la plagua uberta per trops dias; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And then leave him for three days, after applying a poultice with butter and leaving the wound uncovered for too many days, and then treat it with ointment until he is healed.
Diys Albucasis : o, filhs, de aquesta specia de cauteri pauc havem usat per la terror del reguardament de lu, e per aquo que paucs havem trobatz les quals reguardan sobre lu.	O, my children, we have used this type of cauterization sparingly due to the fear it instills and for that reason few have ventured into exploring its benefits.
Mays dels bos cauteris a lu qui les sufferta, et atroba am aquel le loc de lu.	May the good cauterizations be upon him who endures them, and may it restore his place.
Mays cauteri am medicinas adhurentz es que tu fassas dos cercles haventz armula perforada en la qual deyssen le guaffo de la porta de ferr; sia la longuitut de la paretz en la nauteza de lor sian dos nozes o quays aquels.	May the cautery with adhesive medicines be upon you, which you will make by forming two circles with perforated hoops in which the goat's hair of the iron door protrudes; their length being that of the thickness of a wall, whether it is two nuts or more.
E si le spazi le qual es entre quascu la quantitat de la grossitut del dit; e sian ubertz dejos e desus, e sian que contenguan se entre lor segon aquesta forma:	And if the space between each one is equal to the thickness of the finger; and they are opened below and above, and they contain themselves in this manner:
E aprop pausa sobre la partida de la anqua le malaut jasent sobre le latz sa, e comprem la tua ma sobre la partida de la anqua; e aprop pren de aygua cauda e fon la entre dos cercles, e la qualiditat de aquela sia am le foc petit a petit, e te aquela per la quantitat de una hora, e sufferta le malaute la mordicacio e la adhustio de lu — quar aquel atrobo mordicacio ayssi cum de foc — entro que cesse la mordicacio.	Then place on the part of the hip where the sick person lies on their side, and press your hand on the part of the hip; then take boiling water and put it between the two circles, its quality being little by little with fire, keep it there for an hour, let the patient endure the bite and adhesion of it - as that bite is like a fire - until the biting stops.
E aprop eleva la tua ma am le instrument et abstergeys l’aygua cauda de tota la anqua am aygua dousa.	And then lift your hand towards the instrument and wipe off all the flowing water with warm water.
E aprop leyssa aquel per tres jorns e pausa sobre aquel boder entro que sia la negror de la adhustio remauguda, e leyssa aquo per alcus jorns, e correra de lu poyredura; aquest es derier en juvament.	Then let it remain like this for three days and place over it some red wine as long as the discoloration of the wound diminishes, and leave that for several more days, then remove any remaining redness from him; this is a final treatment.
E aprop cura aquel am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Then treat it with ointment until it heals.
E si la dolor es extenduda entro la coyssa o la camba, fay a lu estatua en lu que contengua aygua segon que es feyt en la anqua engualment.	And if the pain extends to the thigh or leg, make him sit in water as is done for the hip similarly.
E aquesta es la manieyra de aygua cauda, e yeu ja he scrit aquela en le tractat de la rectificacio de medicinas.	This is the method of warm water, and I have already written about it in my treatise on medicine corrections.
Recipe de alcali e de caus no extinta de amdos ana partida una, e trissa les e pausa en una ola nova de la qual la partida dejos sia perforada per un petit trauc, segon la quantitat que intre en lu ray.	Take one part each of alkali and undried quicklime, crush them both together, then place it in a new jar with a small hole pierced through its lid according to the quantity that goes into the wound.
E pausa dejos le fons de la ola autra ola enveyriada, e gete sobre aquel alcali e caus viva de aygua doussa la qual cobra aquels per un dit, e pus que tu compremes aquels am la tieua ma per bona compressio, e leyssa la hola que deyssenda de lu aygua aguda en la partida dejos a la ola enveyriada.	Then place beneath the bottom of another jar, and pour over that alkali and quicklime some warm water that covers them by one finger's width, then press it with your hand tightly as a good compression, and let there be a cloth descending from the hot water into the hole below to the other jar.
E aprop ajusta tota aquela aygua, e geta la sobre autra caus viva e autre alcali renovelatz, quar aquela lahoras sira de mot forta acuitat, la qual es aministrada en motas operacios de medicina e en cauterizacio dels autres membres, quar operacio fa de foc.	Then adjust all that water and pour it over another living cause or onto fresh ashes because its power will then become extremely sharp, which is administered in many medicinal operations as well as in the cauterization of other body parts, for operation does make you hot.
E so de las medicinas alcunas am las quals es cauterizat ancha, ayssi cum tezizic e mel anacrat e caus am sabo enayssi que sian mesclatz.	And for the medicines where the cauterization is broad, there are also liquid pitch and honey with a taste to match that of them when they are mixed.
E Gualia recontet de un home dels antics la operacio e la curacio am la qual es curada dolor de anqua e de vena sciatica, e magnifiquet mot be esser de aquel, e diys que no hac necessitat de autra curacio, e quar es sanat per una veguada ayssi cum recomtec, quar fort leu aquel intrec en banh e eysic ja sa d’aquel.	Gaius recounted an operation and cure from ancient times which healed joint pain and sciatica; he spoke very highly of it and said no other treatment was needed as this method provided a one-time healing, for the patient's leg became strong upon stepping into that bath.
Et es que sia pres de certarragi vert, e si no es atrobat vert, sia presa figua recent; e mot sia trissada am un pauc de grays e sia pausat sus la anqua en la qual es la dolor, o en la coyssa, o en la camba, e sia liat.	It should be placed near green cypress bark or, if it isn't available, take a fresh fig; chop it up with some bran and place it on the joint where there is pain, whether in the hip, thigh, or leg, then wrap it.
E sia layssat per la cantitat de tres horas o per la quantitat que·l malaute centa cedacio de la adhustio.	And let it remain for three hours or the amount of time that the patient experiences relief from the burning sensation.
E aprop met aquel en banh e donc quan le cors de lu sia enrozat, entromet aquel en le sol, quar la dolor cessa e es sanat.	And then place him in a bath and when his body is relaxed, immerse him into the water, for the pain will subside and he shall be healed.
E sapias que no cove que alcu use de cauteri am aquestas medicinas sino aprop la evacuacio del cors.	And remember, one should not employ the use of cautery with these medicines but rather focus on the evacuation of the body.
Mays ja Escorides diysec que quan am fenda de cabra la vena stretica es cauterizada, aprofieyra a lu mo be; e sia le cauteri am lu segon aquesta manieyra: sia presa lana e sia enbeguda en oli antic, e sia pausat entre le pous del pe e entre le fossil.	It is said that when treating an open wound with goat's milk, the strait vein should be cauterized, and this procedure should benefit him greatly; and let the cautery be done in this manner: take wool and soak it in old oil, and place it between the toes of the foot and the sole.
E aprop pren fenda de cabra secca e emflasma aquela am foc entro que sia fayta carbo; e aprop pausa lu sobre la lana e leysa la entro que sia estengida.	Then take dried goat's milk and flame it with fire until it becomes charcoal; and place this over the wool and leave it there to be extended.
E aprop itera aquo, e no cessas far aquo entro que·l scintiment de la mordicacio pervengua entro al anqua e repausa la dolor.	Repeat this process, and do not cease until the sensation of the sting reaches deep within and relieves the pain.
Et aquesta manieyra de cauteri es apelat cauteri de vaquas.	And this manner of cautery is called cow cautery.

De cauterizacio de dolor de dos.	De cauterizacio de dolor de dos." 
Alcunas veguadas dolor es en le dos per tropas causas, cum per cazement o per percucio o per superflua evacuacio, e per causas ad aquelas semblantz, per infusio de materia frega e humida.	Alcunas veguadas dolor es en le dos per tropas causas, cum per cazement o per percucio o per superflua evacuacio, e per causas ad aquellas semblantz, per infusio de materia frega e humida.
E cauteri no catz sino en aquesta sola specia la qual es fayta per efusio de materia frega.	And this type of cautery is only effective for this specific condition, which is caused by an excess of cold humors.
Donc cove, aprop evacuacio del malaute am pillulas fitidas e am semblant a lor, que sian faytas sobre·l dos en le qual es la dolor tres linhas segon la latitut de lu, pus que senhas am tentha en quascuna linha v cauteris o mays, segon la quantitat que ve de la tolleransa del malaute e de la vertut de lu. De cauterizacio al comensament de gilbositat.	On the cauterization of newly formed tumors."

De cauterizacio de podagra e de dolor de juncturas.	It appears that this phrase is the title of the treatise or chapter, which translates to "On the Cauterization for Gout and Joint Pain." Based on the provided text, it seems to be a medical guide focused on treating gout and joint pain through cauterization techniques. Quan dolor de juncturas son faytas per humors fregas les quals so enfundutz a quascun membre del cors, lahoras quan veno dolors en los pes, de costuma dels metges es que aquo apelen podragua propriament.	Certainly! Here is the translation of each line: 
E donc cum es curada podagra de causa frega am manieyra de cura e no so remaugudas las dolors, lahoras las remau cauteri.	And thus when gout is cured due to coldness and pain has not ceased, one can use a remedy called cauterization.
E es que tu cauterizas aquel aprop evacuacio en le circuit de la junctura del pe am motz cauteris.	And you should perform this cauterization right after the removal of fluid from around the joint in the foot, using multiple small cauteries.
E sia cauteri olivar del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And this is what you should use as your pointed cautery; here is its shape:" (At this point in the text, it would be appropriate to include an image or diagram of the desired cautery tool.)
E si es necessitat que puntz sia fayt sobre la fassia del pe, lahoras fay am cauteri de punt.	And if it is necessary to make points on the surface of the foot, then do so with a pointed cautery.
E si las dolors pujan entro als denolhs o a las autras juncturas, e aquo motas vetz s’endeve, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre quascun donolh am tres cauteris o quatre de tota partida am aquest cauteri olivar.	And if the pain spreads into the toes or other joints, which sometimes happens, you should then cauterize each toe with three or four cauteries of this pointed type.
E si motz cauteris que aquestz cauteris sian a tu necessaris, lahoras cauteriza aquel e no premas trop la tua ma am le cauteri abans, sia tant solament enviro la specitut de la codena.	And if you find yourself needing more of these cauteries, then proceed to cauterize but do not press too hard with your hand on the cautery beforehand; only apply pressure around the size of a fingernail.
E si las dolors pugan entro al donolh e·l dos, lahoras aministra le cauteri le qual havem dit en le sieu capitol.	And if the pain reaches beyond the toes to the rest of the foot, then administer the same type of cautery we described earlier in this chapter.
E si las dolors so en las mas tant solament, e es apelada suagra, lahoras puncta en le circuit dels focils ayssi cum se revolvo, puncta en aquels dos linhas.	E si las dolors so en las mas tant solament, e es apelada suagra, lahoras puncta en le circuit dels focils ayssi cum se revolvo, puncta en aquels dos linhas.
E si reman de las dolors en les ditz, lahoras puncta en le cercuit dels focils sobre quascun notz e sobre la pinche de la ma.	And if the pain remains in the aforementioned areas, then puncture at the nape of the neck above each shoulder and on the back of the hand.
E si las dolors pugan aprop alscus jorns als coydes o als muscles, lahoras cauteriza les quascus de tota part dels ajutoris.	And if the pain spreads over a few days to the knees or muscles, then cauterize each part of the arms.
E no evacuas le malaute de bon regiment e de recepcio de medicinas, quar si es fayt bon regiment e flacma es evacuada am aquest cauteri sira sanat, Dieus ajudan.	Do not dismiss the patient from their treatment regimen and medication intake, for if proper care is given and the inflammation subsides with this cauterization, God willing they will be cured.
Capitol .xlv.	Chapter 45.
De cauterizacio de rompeduras.	On the cauterization of ruptures.
Quan endeve rompedura en les angonars e diysendo les budels denant l’atela al genetiu, e aquo es comensan de aprop, lahoras cove que tu mandas al malaute layssar la sua comestio en le sieu dia e que use de causas leniens per so que la fenda deyssenda del sieu ventre.	When a rupture occurs in the groin area and the intestines or hernia protrude through the genital region, especially when it is beginning to worsen, you should instruct the patient to fast on that day and use only mild remedies so that the wound does not descend further into their abdomen.
E aprop segua le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos, e comanda a lu que tengua le sieu ale entro que sia foro getat o aparesca l’atela o·l budels.	Then support the patient between your two hands on their back and instruct them to push down with their elbow toward the open hole until either the hernia or intestines return inside.
E aprop retorna aquel am les tieus ditz e senha am tenta la ruptura sobre le os del pentenilh am senhal la extremitat del qual sia semblant a la maytat de cercle a las subiranas partidas del cors.	And then return that said instrument to you and try to probe the rupture over the bone of the navel, signaling the extremity of which is similar to half a circle at the divided upper parts of the body.
E aprop igneys le cauteri del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And then ignite the cautery, which has this shape:" (At this point, the text likely describes or illustrates the shape of the cautery tool.)
entro que sia mot rog e gete cintilhas.	While it is red-hot and emits sparks.
E aprop reduzeys le budel o l’atela a la sua conquavitat, e aprop pause la sua ma sobre le loc per so que le budel no yesqua.	Then return the intestine or hernia to its cavity, and place your hand over the area to prevent the intestine from coming out.
E tu ja has ubert entre las coyssas del malaute e dejos lu as pausat un coyssi, et autre servent sia sus las cambas de lu, e autre sus le pietz de lu, le qual tengua las suas mas.	You have already opened the space between the patient's thighs, placed a cushion under them, another servant on their legs, and another on their chest, holding their hands.
E aprop pausa le cauteri sobre aquel senhal am la tua ma am cauteri stan dreyt, e te aquel entro que am lu consieguas le os del pentenilh entro al mieg del duiduni; e itera am aquel autra veguada si a tu aquel no has conseguit en la primieyra veguada entro al os.	Then place the cautery on that signal with your hand holding the cautery upright, and continue until you reach the navel bone at mid-belly; repeat this step if you did not reach the bone during the first attempt.
E observa saviament del ysiment del budel en la hora de la tua cauterizacio, que no comburas aquel budel per so que sobre le malaute no vengua in mort o autre gran malicia.	Observe wisely the emergence of the intestine during your cautery procedure, ensuring you do not burn it, as this could result in death or severe harm to the patient.
E sapias que quan tu am le cauteri no atenhas le os, no confereys la tua operacio.	And know that when you use the cautery, make sure not to touch the bone; otherwise, your operation will be ineffective.
E cove que·l cauteri dels enfants sia subtil segon le gran e la mesura de lor.	The children's cautery should be delicate, according to their size and proportions.
E aprop cura le loc del cauteri per tres dias am boder entro que sia remauguda la scara del foc.	Then care for the cauterized area for three days, keeping it covered to ensure the scar from the fire is healed.
E aprop cura aquel am les autres enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Then take care of that with other ointments until it is fully healed.
E le malaute sia jasent sobre le sieu dos per xl dias entro que sia sigillat le loc e la plagua.	Let the patient rest on their back for forty days, ensuring the wound is sealed and the infection has cleared.
E cove que pauses le nutriment de lu segon la longitut del temps de la curacio de lu le qual le linesca le ventre de lu, e que le budel no yesca fora deves le esforsament de guerir.	Ensure you provide the patient with adequate nourishment according to the duration of their healing process; this should ease their abdominal pain and prevent the intestine from protruding during recovery efforts.
E aprop quan se vol levar aprop xl dias, lahoras aministra liament decentment fayt, e tengua aquel per autres xl jorns.	And then when it's time to get up after forty days, do so gently and appropriately; keep the patient under observation for another forty days.
E sia mermat de trebalh e de replecio de vianda e de beure, e de votz vehementz, quar quan usa de aquest regiment de sanacio entiera sira sanat.	Let them refrain from laborious work, heavy meals, and drinking strong beverages; avoid loud voices too, for when they follow this regimen faithfully, healing will occur.
E yeu diyre la curacio de las rupturas en las autras partidas del ventre, e so al comensament, e vols que no treguan, lahoras cauterisa la ruptura d’aquel am cauteri redon segon la quantitat de lu, e sia aquo que es exhurit de la codena ayssi cum la tersa partida de lu; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit, e no es ajustat.	Here is the translation of your provided text so far: 
E ja diyssero alcus primiers que ruptura sia cauterizada am cauteri triangular segon aquesta forma, pus que es senhada am tenta:	And some say that ruptures should be cauterized with a triangular cautery following this shape, as it is marked on this diagram:
e es pausada linha que eys per la latitut en le latz pus sobira de la ruptura, e autra linha al desus; e depausa la tua ma am un cauteri clavilh, mays le primier cauteri es pus leugier e milhor.	A line is drawn across the width of the side above the rupture, and another line on top; then place your hand with a spiked cautery, but the first cauterization is lighter and better.
Capitol .xlvi.	Chapter 46: 
De cauterizacio de torcio.	On the cauterization of twisted or sprained joints.
Quan endeve en alscus membres per cazement o per percussio dolor e persevera aquela dolor per lonc temps e no comfereys al u curacio am medicinas, lahoras cove que cauterizes am cauteri de punt.	When pain occurs in any member due to dislocation or impact and that pain persists for a long time without being cured by medicines, then it is necessary to cauterize with a pointed cautery.
E sia le cauteri de tot membre segon la magnitut e la parvitat de lu, e vertut e develitat de lu, e locacio de torcio e dolor de lu.	The cauterization of each member should be done according to its size and strength, as well as the nature and location of the dislocation or pain.
Donc si·s sanat per le primier cauteri, bo es; e sino, lahoras itera sobre lu le cauteri; quar de costuma de aquelas dolors es que sian punctatz de membre ad aquel membre le qual apropinque al u, per que cove que consieguas aquels am cauteri entro que·l malaute sia sanat.	If the first cauterization works, it's good; but if not, repeat the cauterization; as it is customary for such pains to be punctured from one member to another, so you must ensure that they are all treated with a cautery until the patient is cured.
Capitol .xlvii.	It appears that you provided me with more text than just the first sentence to translate. Please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with regarding this medieval medical treatise!
De cauterizacio de lepra.	On the cauterization of leprosy.
Les lebros alcunas veguadas am cauteri per mot gran juvament, e magerment si la specia de lepra que es fayta per putrefaccio de flacma e de melencolia.	Some lepers can benefit greatly from the use of cautery, especially if their leprosy is caused by a combination of putrefaction and melancholia.
E donc cum tu vols cauterizar aquel, considera si la lepra es comussan e as aquela curada am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no deysen, ni esta, e temes sobre le malaute que la corrupcio comprehenda tot le cors de lu e tota la compleccio de lu, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre le cap am v cauteris: am un en le mieg loc del cap, e am le segon pus dejos de lu, eves le front a la fi dels cabels; e amdos sobre dos corns; e am un detras, sobre la nuca o servitz.	And so when you wish to cauterize such a patient, consider whether the leprosy is contagious and if it can be cured by what we have already mentioned in this section. Do not hesitate or fear that the corruption of the disease has spread throughout their entire body and its composition; proceed with caution. Cauterize them on the head using five cauteries: one on the top middle of the head, a second just below it towards the front near the hairline, two more on either side above the ears, and finally, one at the back on the nape or neck.
E ultima la tua ma am le cauteri un pauc entro que emprema en le os una petita empressio, e de lu sian deslocadas las scorsas, per so que la expiracio de grossas vapors sia alleujada de lu; e cauteriza sobre la melsa segon que es precesit.	Finally, place your hand on the cautery lightly before applying it to the bone, leaving a small indentation and dislodging any scabs so that the expulsion of thick vapors is eased from the patient's body; proceed with caution as needed.
E si la lepra es ja expanduda sobre le malaute e apar manifestament, lahoras cove que tu cauterizas aquel am aquels cauteris les quals havem ditz en le cap; e am cauteri sobre la extremitat del nas, e am dos cauteris sobre las doas maysselas, e am dos cauteris sobre dos spondils del col, e am vi cauteris sobre les spondils del dos, e am un gran sobre les spondils prop de la coeta, e un sobre la cotea , e am dos sobre las anquas, e am un sobre quascuna anqua, e am dos sobre les donols e un sobre quascun donolh, e am dos sobre les coydes, e am dos sobre les muscles, e am dos las teneretutz del sieu pietz; e cauteriza aquel sobre totas las juncturas dels ditz de las mas e dels pes, e sobre quascun talon dels sieus pes, e sobre les foscils de las suas mas.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E guarda te dels nervis les quals so sobre le talo que no comburas aquels.	And beware of the nerves that are above the ankle, lest you burn them.
E alcunas veguadas es cauterizat am un cauteri sobre le os del pentenilh e am autre sobre la boca del stomac, e autre sobre le fietge.	Sometimes it is cauterized with a cautery on the bone of the penis and another over the mouth of the stomach, and yet another on the liver.
E sapias que quant mays ajustas cauteris, tant es mays juvatiu e mays conferent; e sapias que le malaute no ha en le cauteri dolor, ayssi cum han les sas, per so quar le cors de lu ja es stupefayt.	And know that the more tightly you apply the cauteries, the more beneficial and effective they are; and be aware that the patient does not feel pain from the cautery, just as he does not from his own body, because his body is already stunned.
E cove que les cauteris sian grans o paucs segon les membres e las juncturas segon que es precedit de las specias dels ferramentz.	Ensure that the cauteries are large or small depending on the body parts and joints, as it has been previously specified regarding the types of instruments.
E aprop cura le cauteri am farina de errs coyta am mel e am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then take care of the cauterized area with a poultice made from the fat of roosters mixed with honey, and use another remedy until it is healed.

Quan alcun membre es stabozit o adormit e es curat am medicinas, olis e emplastres, e no es sanat, lahoras tu cauteriza aquel membre stabozit am cauteris segon que merita la grandesa del membre o la parvitat de lu.	When a limb is paralyzed or numb and has been treated with medicines, oils, and poultices but does not heal, you must cauterize that affected limb with cautery instruments according to the size of the limb or its smallness.
E sia lo tieu cauteri intrant la ispicitut de la codena un pauc.	And if your cauterization penetrates slightly into the bone marrow,
E aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then treat it with ointment until it is healed.
E alscunas veguadas es cauterizada alcuna stupor le qual endeve a las mas e als pes, e als spondils del dos e ves le eysiment dels nervis les quals mavon aquel membre, e es remauguda la stupor.	Some swellings are cauterized due to the presence of gangrene, which affects the hands and feet, as well as the vertebrae of the back. This is done after examining the nerves that move this limb, and the swelling is reduced.
Mays no prusuma sobre aquo sino aquel que es savi en la anotomia dels membre e de la egressio dels nervis tot le cors moventz.	No one should assume anything about this process unless they are knowledgeable in the anatomy of the limbs and the emergence of nerves throughout the body.

De cauterizacio de albaras que es morfea.	De cauterizacio de albaras que es morfea.
Quan albaras es antiqua e no comfereys a lu alcu dels enguentz de medicina, lahoras tu cauteriza sobre aquela am cauteri preon un pauc segon la quantitat de la specitut de la codena entro que sia remauguda la blancor e la color de lu, e la color de lu sia mudada. De cauterizacio de cranc.	On skull cauterization.
Quan canser es comensan e vols aquel ostar, lahoras cauteriza aquel am cauteri de cercle en le circuit de lu ayssi cum es revolgut.	When cancer begins to develop and you want to treat it, use a circular-shaped cautery tool and rotate it around the affected area.
E diysero les savis que sia cauterizat am lo derier cauteri en le mieg loc; mays a mi no es vist aquo, quar temi que sia ulcerat, e yeu ja e vist aquo alcunas veguadas.	The wise men said that it should be cauterized with the last type of cautery in its place; but I have never seen this done before, as I fear it may cause an ulcer, and I have witnessed such occurrences on several occasions.
E es pus dreyturier que sia cauterizat en le circuit de lu am cercle ayssi cum avem dit, o am motz cauteris.	It is more appropriate to cauterize it around the affected area with a circular tool, as we mentioned earlier, rather than using multiple point cauteries.

De cauterizacio de adubilati.	On the cauterization of abscesses.
Quan alcun adubilati es tardat en maturacio, e aysso es per la superfluitat fazen aquela, o per etat del malaute, quar es vielh en decrepitat, de pauc sanc, o per le temps, e tu vols festinar en la maturacio de adubilati; lahoras cauteriza en le circuit de lu am motz cauteris petitz punctan; e aprop leyssa aquela quar ela fastinara en maturacio.
