De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	On the collection of pus in the wound.
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	Pus is a result of hardened humours that cover the wound and hinder its treatment, and it prolongs healing over days.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	It is necessary at the beginning to consider whether the wound containing pus is strong and there are no other diseases besides the pus itself; then you can collect that pus.
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And it is you who commands the patient to place their head on your knee, then suspend those veins with an ounce or two according to your judgment; and let that ounce be of fine twine, thus:
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	There are two ounces greatly entwined in one body as follows:
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	Then bind those veins with fine forces, carefully and meticulously, and squeeze the blood out from time to time until you see those veins are depleted of bile and have been cleansed.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	Make sure you do not let the bile flow to the edges of the spine; and if your operation is done at midday under the sun, be very careful in your work so as not to cut anything other than those veins.
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	And when you have finished, then you should distill the bile into a green or red vial so that with its sharpness it can corrode whatever has been cleansed of knowledge.
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	But if it is not possible for you to bind everything in that hour, then apply a plaster made of whatever alleviates their pain, and let them rest for a few days until their pain subsides and they are certain of no hidden abscess.
E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	And then repeat the process on him in the same manner until he is healed.

De reduccio de arizati al nas.	Regarding the reduction of a dislocation in the nose:
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	When you treat a dislocation with cautery or sharp burning medicine as described previously and it is not healed, then do not touch the patient but instead make an incision over the abscess to bring about its maturation, and remove all the pus until the bone is exposed.
E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	And so when the bone is exposed and there is corruption or blackness in it, then you should scrape it with an instrument of this shape:
E es nompnat de aspre cap, e sia feyt de fer indi, e sia le cap redon ayssi cum asir le qual sia fayt punctat per punctacio de lima o aliskalfati per punctacio subtil (ayssi cum es en la forma seguent).	It is called an 'aspre cap', and it should be made of Indian iron, with a rounded head that is covered in small points created by fine filing or scratching (as shown in the following shape).
E pausa aquel sobre le loc corrumput del os, e aprop revolveys aquel entre les tieus ditz, e prem la tua ma petit a petit entro que sapias que aquela corropcio es rasa.	Place the instrument over the corrupted bone area and then scrape it between your fingers, pressing with your hand little by little until you know that all corruption has been removed.
E aquo sia fayt alcunas veguadas, e aprop restaura le loc am causas exsiccativas e stipticas.	And this should be done several times, then restore the area with drying and astringent remedies.
Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat.	So if the wound has healed, good flesh has grown over it, and the body is separated from the disease for forty days without any renewal or formation of pus, then you may know that it is cured.
E sino, lahoras no es en lu engen sino reduzir la fissura a la forma del nas, e segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu descuebras de segon os am ferr o am medicina acuta, e cum sira descubert le os, lahoras tu pren tribo segon aquesta forma:	But if it is not healed, then the only option is to reduce the wound to the shape of the nose. This can be done in two ways: either using an iron tool or through the application of sharp medicine. When exposing the bone with the iron tool, you should take care to follow this form:
Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	Let the end of your iron tool be triangular, with its base being tapered to that same point.
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le os, e sia aquel prop del lacrimal; e alongua la tua ma un pauc del huel, e aprop revol la tua ma am le tribo entro que penetre tot le os, e aquel sente le malaute per asso que atroba vent yssir per so quan te la sua ma.	Then place the tool on top of the bone near the lacrimal bone; stretch out your hand a little further to reach it and rotate your hand back along that path until you feel the patient flinch, for then you will know that this is deep enough.
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	Then restore the area with drying, astringent medicine as you have been taught.
Donc cum nays la carn e·l loc es endurazit, lahoras la materia la qual effundia a las partidas deforo retorna al nas, donc aquo es pus leugier sobre le malaute.	Once the flesh and the area have hardened, then the material that was expelled to the outside parts returns into the nose, which makes it lighter for the patient.
Capitol .xx.	Chapter 20.
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	On the reduction of the hernia's prominence.
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	When the hernia protrudes fully and there is no harm nor diminution in the testicles, then you should let the patient rest, and afterwards follow him up, and also apply bandages around his neck without any scarification or suction for good evacuation; and afterwards put on the hernia a liniment which has been made from acacia gum, aloe, incense and resin, and afterwards fix an emplastrum upon the hernia with some powder.
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	And the way to make powder is that you should take lion's skin cloths cut into pieces, and every cloth be folded in four places; then grind those bits.
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	And afterwards put those one on top of the other depending on how much the hernia needs.
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	And then bind those with a sturdy cloth firmly, and repeat the suction cups without scarification, and afterwards remove the cups and leave the hernia to be free during day and night.
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	However, if in the meantime the ligament has softened, then it should be very tight.
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	Then tie the bandage both day and night, as we have mentioned earlier.
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	And if you see the wound has been reduced in size, good, and if not, then repeat the poultice with the powders, the compression, and the cupping until it is healed.

De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	This seems to be the title of another chapter or section in the medieval medical treatise, perhaps related to eye surgery. I am happy to provide further translation if you have specific lines you'd like me to work on!
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	When there is a rupture in the choroid and it becomes prominent, forming like a grape stem with a man's face on it, and you wish to incise this, then the operation on him will be as we have described: insert one needle into the root of the choroid from below upwards, then place another needle where there is double tissue from the part near the lacrimal bone, and let this penetrate while letting go of the first needle according to its position. Then incise the location of the double tissue and lift up with it that portion of the choroid in a circular motion around the needle, and tighten it very firmly.
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	And then extract the needle and place it on a piece of wool soaked in hen's albumen and egg white, allowing the thread to fall with the drop.
E aprop cura le huel am aquo que conforte aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	Then treat the wound with something that comforts it until the plague is healed.
E alcunas veguadas aduna de tota partida am cercle de drap entro le huel ajuste eminencia gran, e aprop sia perforat am le spatum subtil que vengua al preon del huel, e corra la humiditat albuginea, e descen le huel e intra tantost.	And sometimes bring together small pieces of cloth from all sides with a circle to fit around the wound, then pierce it carefully with a thin spatula that goes into the depth of the wound, and let out the white moisture, lowering the wound and entering immediately.
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	And then it will be strong until it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	This indicates that this is the twenty-second chapter of the medieval medical treatise.
De curacio de alconati.	On the treatment of those who have been wounded.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This ailment known as 'alconati' is merely gangrene, which resembles descending water and is not the genuine article." 
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	And if it does not move downward, know that it is water.
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	However, if the path to recovery is not prepared as we have described, then make the patient lie between your arms and take a fine spatula; place it over the panniculus near the edge of the wound, connecting the conjunctiva with the tunica cornea at the crown (inside the hole), ensuring the healthy area is protected.
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	Once the healthy area is protected, you may then drip into the wound a healing water infused with honey or water in which you have boiled fenugreek and honey.
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	Then treat it with the other remedies until it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	It seems that this may be the chapter number in your text, indicated as "Chapter 22". Do you have another sentence for me to translate?
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	Regarding the treatment of water descending from the navel.
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	We have already mentioned the ingredients of the water in this section, and what needs to be pierced with a specific treatment method, depending on the health.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	Then ensure you make the patient lie between your arms on a soft pad and bind their navel tightly.
E aprop pausa prop de la palpebra del sieu huel la tua ma senestra, si le huel en le qual es l’aygua es le huel senestra; o am la tua ma dreyta, si le huel es le dextre.	And then place your left hand close to their eyelid on the side where the fluid is, which is usually the left eye; or use your right hand if it's the right eye.
E aprop am la tua ma dextra pren almagda, si le huel es senestre; o am la tua ma senestra, si le huel es de dreyt.	And then use your right hand to take the pad (for the fluid), if it's on the left side; or your left hand if it's on the right side.
E aprop pausa la extremitat de almagda prop de la corona per la grossesa del ray en le album del huel de part del mendre lacrimal, e aprop enpelleys almagda am vertut e revol la tua ma am aquel.	Then place the end of the pad near the edge for the size of the tube in the white part of the eye near the smaller tear duct, and then gently wipe the pad across your hand.
E aprop penetre en le album del huel e sentas que almagda ja es pervenguda a causa vueda.	And then insert it into the white part of the eye, feeling that the pad has reached the area due to visibility.
E cove que sia la masura del cami de almagda al preon la mesura del spazi le qual es de la pupilla entro a la fi de la negror, e es la corona del huel; quar tu veyras am aquel pupilla am la visio de l’huel per la clartat de la tunica cornea.	Ensure that the length of the pad's journey to the front is equal to the space from the pupil to the end of the dark area, which is the edge of the eye; for you will see with this pupil and have vision through the clarity of the cornea.
E aprop pausa almagda entro al loc en le qual es l’aygua, e aprop tu la atira en jos una veguada aprop autra, e donc si la aygua descen tantost, lahoras vetz le malaute aquo sobre le qual huebre la sua vista tantost, e almagda en le sieu huel.	Then place the pad over the area where the fluid is and gently press it down once; then do so again, and if you see that the fluid has descended slightly, then you have the patient focus their vision on this for a moment, with the pad still in their eye.
E aprop repausa se un pauc; donc si la aygua es descenduda, lahoras tu depausa aquela autre veguada abantz que almagda ne sia getada.	And then rest a little; so if the water has descended, then you can remove that other one before an enema is given.
E donc quan es sicada e no descen, lahoras tu extrat almagda am facilitat, e revol am aquel la tua ma pauc a pauc, e aprop dissolveys en l’aygua un petit de sal clara de gemma e am aquela lava le huel dedintz; e aprop pausa fora le huel coto o stopa o lana infusa en oli rozat e album de huou e ligua am aquo le huel sa.	And when it is dry and does not descend, then you can extract the enema with ease, and turn it with your hand little by little, and then dissolve a small amount of clear rock salt in water and use that to wash the inside; and then place outside the outlet either a cork, or tow, or wool infused in rose oil and egg white, and seal the outlet with that.
Mays nos e aquels que so de nostre temps pause sobre aquel comi trissat am album de huou.	We and those who come after us should place over it, that is the wound, egg white.
E si no obezeys a tu almagda al intrament de l’huel per la sua duricia — quar es alcu dels homes del qual le huel es dur mot —, lahoras cove que prenguas le spatum le qual es nompnat alberid del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if you do not obey by giving them an enema inside the wound due to its hardness – for there are some men whose wounds are very hard –, then take the spatula which is called *alberid*, of which this is the form:" [At this point, the text likely describes or illustrates the shape of the tool.]
E donc perfora am aquel aquela conjunctura, e no ultimes la tua ma en le trauc, e no es si no que fassas via ad almagda loc subtil.	And so pierce with it that joint, but do not finish by inserting your hand into the hole, and let nothing else be done other than giving an enema to a subtle place.
E aprop entromet almagda segon que havem dit.	And now introduce the ointment as we have mentioned earlier.
E deves le compliment de la tua obra, sia preparat al malaute dormitori descentment fayt en le qual dorma sobre le sieu dos en mayson tenebrosa, e sia prohibit de totz movementz .	You must complete the treatment and prepare the patient for a decent sleep, ensuring they are lying on their back in a dark room, and prohibiting any movement.
E pausa en la natura de lu aquo per que sia linida la sua natura, e no maugua le sieu cap a la partida dreyta ni senestra de tot.	Place them in an environment that is calm and soothing to their nature, ensuring their head is not positioned towards the right or left side.
E sia le liament segon la sua disposicio entro al tertz dia.	And bandage them according to their positioning, making sure it is completed within three days.
E aprop deslia aquel en aquela maysso tenebrosa e exproha la freol vista, e fay li vezer alcunas causas, e aprop retorna le liament entro al dia .vii.	Then untie the patient from that dark room and expose them to fresh air, allowing them to see some light sources. After this, reapply the bandage within seven days.
E no cove que fassas aquo en la hora de las curacios o tantost aprop la infusio.	It is not necessary to do this during the hours of treatment or immediately after infusion.
Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	Later, it is necessary for you to do this due to the fear that water may pass through too quickly and cause great distress.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	However, if an abscess occurs, it is essential to untie the patient before the seventh day and address the issue with a treatment that specifically targets the abscess.
Lahoras tu absol la vista de lu e pausa sobre la cara de lu oral per le qual sia regit le vezement de lu dejos lu per alcus dias, lu existent en la mayszo tenebrosa.	Now you release his sight and place a cloth over his face so that he is completely regulated for some days in the darkest room.
E aprop sia gitat de aquela mayzo gradantment e conversa8 en las suas causas.	Then remove him from that dark room gradually, while talking to him about the causes of his illness.
E sapias que in alchatea no es excusat le discipol de visio alcunas veguadas, e lahoras tu sias ardit sobre la operacio.	And remember that a pupil of the art should not be exposed to bright lights during his recovery, so you must be bold in your actions.
E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua.	We have heard of some who practice the art, and one said that he made fire in the air by piercing it with a straw through which water was sucked up.
Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	However, I have never seen anyone in our land accomplish this feat, nor is it written about in any of the ancient books; perhaps this is a new development.
E aquestas so las formas de las specias de magdaan per que sia sobre aquelas aquel le qual ignora aquelas:	These are the ways to identify the different types of magic, for someone who is unaware of these arts:
E sian faytas de eram o de ferr propriament, e sian las extramitatz de lor am aquesta subtilitat triangulada, la extremitat aguda ayssi cum aquela es la forma.	Whether they are made of horn or iron, and whether their ends have this triangular subtlety, the sharp end is always shaped like this.
Capitol .xxiv.	Chapter XXIV (or 24). 
De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	When in the nose are born diverse tissues fitted together, of which some cause resembles the shape of a scorpion with many feet or to a polyp; this disease is called polyps as it represents that creature.
E de lu es carn cancrosa, lapadea, de fusca color; e de lu es que es carn leon no de color fusca.	And from it is cancerous flesh, ulcerated, of dark colour; and from it is that which is called lion's flesh but not of a dark colour.
Donc en aquela que es en aquestas carns leon no fraudulenta ni cancroza, cove que fassas le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e posat al solelh, e huebre las nars de lu, e picoys le tieu onci en aquelas carns.	So in the case that it is in this lion's flesh which is neither fraudulent nor cancerous, have the patient sit between your arms and place them under the sun, and open their nostrils, and prick their skin with a lancet on those fleshy parts.
E aprop extrat aquela a las partidas deforo, e aprop inscindeys aquo que has comprehendut de aquelas am spatum agut subtil de la una partida entro que sapias que tota la carn ja es ostada; que si roman de lu deguna causa de la qual la abscisio es possibla, lahoras tu ratz aquo am la un dels estrumentz subtils am facilitat entro que de lu romangua denguna causa.	Then extract that from the divided parts outside and then separate what you have understood of those with a thin sharp-pointed spatula from one part until you know that all the flesh is removed; so if there remains any cause which allows for excision, then remove it using one of your fine instruments as long as no cause still exists.
Mays si senhoreja am sanc o accida apostema caut, lahoras tu pausa a lu aquo que cove; o es dels apostemas malignes, lahoras tu coyta e cauteriza aquel entro que sia abscindit sanc e sian ostadas las cavas totas.	But if it starts bleeding or an abscess appears suddenly, then apply to them what is necessary; if it is one of the malignant abscesses, then bind and cauterise that part so that it is cut off from blood supply and so that all the cavities are cleaned.
E aprop sia getatz en le nas aprop la inscizio vi agre e aygua o vi.	And then pour into the nose a mixture of vinegar and water or wine.
Mays si le nas es ubert e de lu procezeys humiditat entro al palat, lahoras sapias que ja es sanat.	If the nose is opened and it produces moisture or humidity within the palate, then you know that it has been cured.
Mays si la humiditat no penetra segon que cove, lahoras tu sapias que dedintz lu es carn nada en los pus sobiras osses de las nars als quals non es pervengut abscizio.	If the humidity does not penetrate as it should, then you know that there is still flesh inside and the bones of the nose have not been reached by the incision.
Donc lahoras cove que entromitas fiel de li al qual sia alcuna grosseza, e nuza en lu motz nuzes, e pausa entre quascun nutz la quantitat del dit o mens, e engene le malaute e entromet una extremitat del fiel en le nars am lo ray o am autra causa la qual es a lu possibla.	Therefore, it is necessary to insert the blade of a knife into it, with some thickness, and put several almonds inside, leaving a space between each almond equal to that of a finger or less. Then push the patient's nose and insert one end of the knife inside using a rod or another similar instrument.
E pus que aquo aura fayt, que atire le sieu odorament entro que pervengua a las canals de las nars, e sia eyssit sobre le sieu golayro, quar tropas veguadas le semblant ad aquesta accio fan les enfantz a las scolas, e es leugiera causa ad aquel que ho vol far.	And after doing this, let the patient sniff their own excrement, which reaches the nose's passages and is smelled on their throat. This resembles what children do in schools as a form of punishment; it is a light cause for those who wish to perform such an act.
E aprop pausa las dos extramitatz del fiel, una extremitat que iesca sobre le nas et l’autra que romangua en le nas, e aprop aministra serratura de carn am les nuzes que so en le fiel, e fay aquo entro que sapias que las carn ja so am les nuzes del fiel.	Then hold both ends of the knife, one end protruding from the nose and the other remaining inside the nose, and administer a lock made of meat around the almonds that are on the knife; do this until you know that the meat is already covering the almonds on the knife.
E aprop extratz le fiel, e pausa en le nas aprop la abstraccio del sanc una calgua , e fay aquo per tres dias o mays entro que l’enguent corrodo tot aquo que es romas de las carns.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E aprop en la fi de la causa, pausa en le nas una canula de plom per alscus jorns entro que sia sanat.	And finally, at the end of the treatment, place a leaden cannula in their nose for a few days until they are healed.
Mays si endigeys de curacio que exsique, usa de aquela.	Also, if there is an urgency to the cure, use this method instead:
E aquesta es la forma del instrument a capipurge fazedor am le qual son distillatz olis e medicinas en le nars:	This is the design of the purging instrument, which distills oils and medicines into the nose:" (followed by a description or illustration)
E fay aquo de argent o de eram, la qual sia semblant a una petita lampesa uberta, ayssi cum petita conqua, e le meat semblantment.	Make this out of silver or brass; it should resemble a small open lamp with a shallow bowl and a narrow spout.
E si vols, fay una canula clausa ayssi cum cana, e la cancula del estrument a capipurge fazedor e sia plana, descuberta; a la qual sia manubre en lo derier de lu, am le qual tenguas aquela quan escaufas en lu oli o aquo que tu vols dels sucs e de las causas suctiblas.	And if you wish to create the cannula, make it like a narrow tube; it should be closed at one end and open at the other, with the bowl of the purging instrument flat and uncovered. There should be a handle on the back for holding while you pour in the oil or water, along with any juices or extractions as required.
E aquestz capipurgi es precios: recipe de enforbi de castor, de balayra blanc, de giengiebre, e piletre de safra, de pebre lonc, de escafragia, de epetum de spic ana unc. vi cumfizeys am suc de bleda e de caul, e sian faytas pillulas, e sia destemprada una pillula am aygua tebeza, e sia gitat en las nars del malaute jasent envers.	These purging mixtures are valuable: take some beaver's grease, white balsam, ginger, saffron juice, long pepper, scorpion venom (or extract), and spike; mix them with wheat bran and cabbage juices into a paste and make it into pills. Then moisten one pill in lukewarm water and place it up the patient's nose.

De theyls natz en las extramitatz del nas.	They arise in the extremities of the nose.
Motas veguadas es nat theyl en las extramitatz del nas, e es magnificat e omentat en alscus dias entro en que mot es leg le reguardament de lu.	Mottled veils are born from the tear of the nose, and it is remarkable how in a few days that which was hidden is now revealed for all to see.
E per aquo cove que tu inscidas aquel en le comensament de la apparissio de lu, e erediques tot aquel.	And because of this, you must engrave what was said at the beginning of its appearance, and inherit all of it.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc o cauteri o medicina comburent la qual estia en loc de lu.	Then apply to the area either a cautery or medicine that will combat it, which should be placed on it.
Mays si es tardada la sua inscizio entro que sia magnificat, lahoras considera si es lapificat, dur, de fusca color e de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr quar es apostema crancos; quar motas veguadas ad aquel que inscideys aquesta apostema endeve per lu granda malicia sobre aquel le qual aquel havia.	If its incision is delayed and it becomes significant, then consider whether it has become hardened, turned black, and has little feeling; in which case do not touch it with iron because it is cranks' abscess; for mottled veils at those who incise this abscess come about by their great malice upon whom it had.
E si le apostema es de leon tocament e no es de fosca color, e vezes que inscizio es possibla en tot aquel, lahoras evacua le malaute e inscideys aquel senes temor, e cura le loc am aquo que exsique e costrenh entro que sia sanat.	And if the abscess is from a lion's touch and it has not turned black, and at times its incision is possible on all of it, then evacuate the patient and incise that without fear, and treat the area with something drying and restraining until it is healed.
Capitol .xxvi.	Capitol .xxvi.
De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.
Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquela operacio sino en alcus homes.	Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquella operacio sino en alcus homes.
Donc cove, quan endeve ad alcu alcuna causa de aquelas, que consideres si es plagua fresca am le sieu sanc, e lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, when you encounter any case of these diseases (plagues or infections), consider whether the patient's blood is still fresh and moist. Then, close the two lips or edges of the wound with stitches, and ensure that the interior part heals as well.
E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partida de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.	And if the edges of the wound are already separated and each one is made healthy, then it is necessary for you to trim off any part of the surrounding flesh until no more blood appears.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias am sutura e strenh aquelas, e sobre aquelas pulveriza sanc de drago e enses trissat, e pausa sobre la polvera una pessa de emplaustra diafinicon, o de alcu autre dels emplastres consolidatius, e leyssa aquel liat per dos jorns o per tres, e aprop deslia aquel e permuta aquel emplaustre e leyssa aquel entro que·ls fiels per si sian abscinditz, e aprop cura am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then join the two lips or edges with stitches and strengthen them, sprinkling over them dragon's blood powder (cinnabar) and finely ground alum, then place on this a piece of diaphanicon plaster or any other strengthening plaster, and leave it bound for two or three days; then take off the bandage and change the plaster until you see that the pus has been drained out. Then treat with ointment until it is healed.
Mays la manieyra de la sutura es que tu agregues la solucio de continuitat o am agulhas ayssi cum havem recomtat en la sutura del ventre, o agregua la solucio de continuitat am fiel ayssi cum a tu e fayt saber.	The method of stitching is as follows: you can bring the edges of the wound together with stitches, either using needles as we have recommended for abdominal surgery or suturing it directly by hand.

De extraccio de aquela causas que veno en las doas labias en las partidas dedintz.	De extraccio de aquella causas que veno en las doas labias en las partidas dedintz.
Motas veguadas endeve a motz homes en las partidas dedintz de las suas labias alcus apostemas durs semblantz a gras de errs, e alscunas de lors son mendres e alcunas son majors.	Many warts are seen here on many men in the parts inside their lips as hard blisters resembling goose grease, and some of them are smaller while some are larger.
Donc cove que tu convertas las labias e fendas quascuna de aquelas duricias de tota part, e aprop la abscizio umpliscas le loc de sagi trissat entro que·l sanc sia restrengut, e aprop sia lavat am vi agre e sia curat le loc am aquo que es stipticitat, entro que sia sanat.	Therefore you must convert the lips and gums of each of those hardnesses from all parts, then fill the excision with a sage tincture until the blood is restricted, and then it should be washed with sour wine and the area treated with a styptic substance until it is healed.

De inscizio de la carn ajustada en las gengivas.	Regarding the excision of tight flesh from the gums.
Granre de veguadas nays sobre la gengiva carn ajustada la qual les antics apelero albulus, adonc cove que tu suspendas aquela am onci o que tenguas aquela am las forfecs e inscidas aquela deves la sua razit, e leyssas la sania correr o le sanc.	To remove warts that are found on tight flesh of the gums, which the ancients called albulus, you should take hold of it with thumb and forefinger or cut it off with scissors close to its root, and let the blood flow freely until it stops.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc sagi trissat o autra polveras stipticas o excicativas.	Then place on the affected area a tincture of sage or other astringent or caustic powder.
E si aquela carn retorna, lahoras inscideys aquela segundariament, e cauterisa aquela, quar aprop le cauteri no retornara.	And if that flesh returns, then cut it away again and cauterize it, for the cautery will not bring it back.

De razo de dentz am ferr.	Because of the decay in your teeth, they need to be extracted." 
Quan en la superficia de las dentz de las partidas dedintz e de las de foro e entre las gingivas so ajustadas escorsas aspras, legas, e alcunas veguadas son de nigradas e son faytas citrinas o vertz entro que a la gingiva ve per aquo corrupcio e son faytas las dentz legas.	When the surface of the teeth, both back and front, as well as between the gums, is covered with rough scabs, hard, and some blackened, becoming yellowish or green over time, leading to gum corruption and loose teeth.
E donc cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas e pausar le cap de lu en le tieu se, e ratz las dents en las quals apareysso aquelas escorsas e causas semblantz arena entro que de lor no romangua deguna causa, e aquo fay de la negror e de la citrinitat e de las autras entro que sian mondificadas.	Therefore, you must make the patient lie between your legs and place their head on your knee, then scrape away the scabs that appear on these teeth, making them similar to sand so that no cause of blackness or yellowness remains, as well as any other colors indicating decay.
Donc si es ostat aquo que es en aquelas del comensament de la razio, bo es; e sino, lahoras tu itera la razio sobre aquelas al autra dia e al segon e al tertz entro que vengua al derier stament en aquo que tu vols.	If what you observe is at the beginning of this process, it's good; but if not, then repeat this treatment on these teeth for another day and so forth until you achieve the desired outcome.
E sapias que las dentz han necessitat de motz rezoris de diversas formas e de motas figuras segon que es preparat a la tua operacio.	Know that teeth require various tools of different shapes and sizes to be prepared for this operation.
E per so quar le razori am le qual la dent es raza de la partida dedintz es autre del razori am le qual es ras entre las dentz segon autras formas, e aquestas formas de razoris sian deves tu preparadas las quals veyras tantost:	And because the razor used to scrape from behind the back teeth is different than the one used to scrape between other types of teeth depending on their shape; therefore these various forms of scrapers must be prepared, which you shall see shortly:

D’eradicacio de dentz.	D’eradicacio de dentz.
Cove que tu cures la dent de la sua dolor am tot engen e tardes en tota eradicacio de lu, quar no es denguna causa que suplisqua la veguada de lu quan es eradicada, quar es sustancia sublima entro que es excusacio en la eradicacio de lu.	Here is my translation of the provided text:

Here is my translation of the provided text: 
Donc cum deves tu es sertificat qual es la dent dolent, e que o sabes be, lahoras cove que tu scarifiques en le circuit de la dent am spatum en le qual sia alcuna vertut, entro que sia dissolvut de la dent de la gingiva de tota partida, e aprop mau aquel am les tieus ditz, o am forfexs subtils al comensament petit a petit entro que aquela concucesquas.	When you need to be certain which tooth is causing the pain and have identified it correctly, then make an incision in the area of the tooth with a spatula that has some healing property (such as dissolving gum around the whole tooth), and then use your own words or subtle scissors at the start, gradually cutting through until you can remove it.
E aprop alogua en lu fortz tenalhas grans per bona loquacio o estuptura fort, e pausa le cap del malaute entre les tieus denolhs que be le tengues que no·s maugua, e aprop tratz la dent segon rectitut en manieyra que no trenques aquela, ni al malaute major dolor no dones.	Use strong pincers to firmly grip him for a good extraction or operation, place the patient's head between your knees so that you have full control and can avoid causing harm, then remove the tooth following its natural shape in order to minimize breaking it and causing further pain to the patient.
E donc si no es foro-getat, lahoras pren un de aquels instrumentz, e met aquel dejos lu de tota part am facilitat e esforsa la remocio de lu ayssi que es feyt al comensament.	And so if you haven't forgotten this step, take one of those instruments and place it underneath the tooth from all sides with ease and effort, apply force for its removal in a way that is gentle at first.
Mays si la dent es trauquada o corrosa, lahoras cove que tu comples de drap aquel trauc e estrenguas aquel am la extremitat de ray subtil per so que no sia trinquada en la hora de la tua constriccio sobre aquela am tenalas.	However if the tooth is wobbly or decayed, you must wrap it in cloth first and tighten this with a thin string at its end to prevent it from breaking when you grasp it with pincers.
E cove que tu obres exquesitament am scarificacio en le circuit de tota part de la gingiva e guarda mot la tua fortaleza que no trenques aquela e romangua partida de lu, e retorne sobre le malaute per la malicia que sia majo que la primieyra dolor de lu. And if there is bleeding from the wound, along with visible clots, then sprinkle a small amount of eggshell powder and apply it to the wound; if that doesn't work, use cautery.
La forma de las forceps e tenalas subtils am las quals es mauguda la dent al comensament sia de longua extramitat, de breu manubre e gros, per so que no sian doblatz quan am aquels deves obrar.	The shape of the forceps and fine pincers, with which you extract teeth at their beginning, should be made from a long and thin handle but thick enough that they don't bend when operating.
E sian ayssi cum vezes de gros manubre entro que quan estrenhas am aquelas no sian dobladas, sian breus extramitatz.	And sometimes they have thick handles instead to ensure that when you open them with your hand, the tips don't bend.
E sian faytas de ferr de India descentment faytas de dreytas extramitatz, e en las extramitatz de aquelas sian dentz de las quals las unas intron en las autras e estrenhan per constriccio descent fort, e alscunas veguadas las extramitatz de aquelas sian la forma del bec d’un auzel le qual ha nom ciconia, so es guanta, e son de fort constriccio.	And they are made from Indian iron with straight tips and the tips of each have teeth that interlock to allow a strong grip; sometimes their tips have a hooked shape like a bird's beak called a stork's bill which has powerful gripping strength.

De erradicacio de dentz e d‘estraccio dels osses de las mandibulas trincadas.	On the extraction of teeth, and on removing jaw bones that have been fractured.
Quan deves la eradicacio de dent le qual es trinquat roman alcuna causa, lahoras cove que tu pauses sobre le loc coto am boder per un jorn o per dos entro que·l loc sia mollificat; e aprop entromet algesti o tenalhas las extramitatz de las quals so asembladas al bec de un auzel apelat ciconia o guanta, la forma de las forceps:	When you need to extract a tooth that is firmly lodged (probably due to infection), it is recommended that you place cotton soaked in oil of lilies on the affected area for one or two days until it softens; then insert a pair of forceps-like instruments with curved ends resembling the beak of a stork or heron.
Las extramitatz de lor sian faytas dedintz ayssi cum lima o alfagi.	The tips of these instruments should be filed or ground smooth, just like a file or whetstone.

e am autres instrumentz les quals precidero en rasura de dentz; quar juvament es fayt am aquest instrument le qual es asemblat a onci gran, e aquesta es la forma:	And I will require other instruments which will be used for tooth extraction; when this action is performed with the aid of this instrument, it resembles an ounce (measure), and its shape is as follows:
de la triangulada extremitat torta o curta, la qual sia alcuna grossesa, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	The tip is slightly curved or bent, either inward or outward, which should be of a certain thickness and not too sharp to avoid breakage.
E otra sapias que·ls instrumentz de las dentz motz so e semblantment les autres instruments.	Also, note that the instruments used for extracting broken teeth have similar characteristics to other surgical tools.
Mays le artifexs savi e subtil en l’art, atroba per si mateys segon aquo que a lu significa la operacio e las malautias diversas; quar son de las malautias a las quals les antics no diysero ni pausero propri instrument, per las formas de diversas specias. De la cura de las dentz eminentz sobre las autras.	On the treatment of teeth that stand out or differ from others.

De restauracio de dentz maugudas am fiel de aur o de argent.	On the restoration of broken teeth with gold or silver wire.
Quan accideys a las dentz devant concussio e remossio per percussio o per cazament, e le malaute no pot strenher sobre aquo que manga, e tu has curat aquel am medicinas stipticas, e no ha valgut la tua curacio, lahoras per so que no cagan es engen en aquelas que sian strengudas am fiel de aur e no de argent, quar argent se fa vert e aprop se poyreys aprop alscus dias, mays aur nul temps no es mudat.	When there is injury to the front teeth due to concussion and displacement caused by a blow or fall, and the patient cannot chew properly, and you have treated it with astringent medicines but your treatment has not been effective, then it is necessary that they be fastened with gold wire instead of silver, for silver turns green and will cause problems after some days, while gold does not change over time.
E sia le fiel en tal subtilitat e grocesa segon la quantitat que puesca entrar entre las dentz; e la forma de la reccio es que prenguas le fiel e pren lo doble de lu entre doas dentz sanas, e aprop que cresques am doas tortuositatz del fiel entre doas maugudas, o si’ una o motas, entro que pervengua la tela a la dent sana del autra partida.	The wire should be of such fineness and thickness according to the space between the teeth; and regarding its shape or form, you must take the wire and measure twice that length between two healthy teeth, then bend both ends of the wire with your fingers so that it fits into the gap between the broken tooth/teeth.
E aprop itera le teyssiment entro a la partida de la qual comenciest, e strenh la tua ma am facilitat e savieza entro que no sia mauguda.	And then repeat the process of inserting the tissue into the incision you started with, and press your hand gently with care and wisdom so as not to cause further harm.
E sia la tua striccio am la qual strenhas le fiel deves las razitz de las dentz que no evasesca.	Your compression should be applied near where you removed the gallbladder, being careful not to damage any of the surrounding teeth roots.
E aprop inscindeys las extramitatz del fiel superfluens am las forceps o tosoyras, e agregua aquelas en quascun loc am gesti, e converteys aquelas e las occulta entre la dent sana e la dent mauguda, per so que no fassa lesio a la lengua.	Then cut off the excess ends of the removed gallbladder using forceps or scissors, and place them in a container with care. Afterward, dispose of them properly, ensuring they are not left where they could cause harm or infection.
E aprop leyssa aquela ayssi streyta cum roman.	And then let the patient rest as straight as a Roman soldier.
Mays si es desliada o rumpuda, strenh aquela o aquelas am autra fiel en tal manieyra en tot son temps.	But if the patient becomes unsteady or falls, support them or help them get up as soon as possible.
E aquesta es la forma de las dentz e la figura de la rectacio de doas dentz sanas e de doas maugudas, ayssi cum vezes aquestas liadas:	This is an illustration of the structure of teeth and the appearance of two healthy teeth and two damaged or decayed ones as seen here:" (The AI cannot generate this image)
E quan se fa que retorno una dent o doas aprop le cazement de quascuna en lors locs, e sian recrescutz ayssi cum havem recomtat, e que remauguan.	And when the tooth or teeth are extracted and their sockets start to heal, they can grow back in their original places as described earlier. However, these new teeth may not be perfect and could have imperfections.
E no fa aquo sino bo artifexs e savi.	And do not perform this unless you are an expert and skilled artisan.
E alcunas veguadas es aptat alcuna causa dels osses de vaca, e es fayt de lor ayssi cum forma de dent, e es pausada en loc en le qual defayl la dent, e es strengit ayssi cum havem dit, e reman e serveys am aquel per lonc temps.	In some cases, a certain cause is attributed to the bones of cows, and they are shaped like teeth, placed in the location where the tooth is missing, tightened as we have mentioned, remaining and serving for a long time.

De inscizio del liament le qual ve en la lengua e prohibeys loquela.	Regarding the incision of the ligament that enters the tongue, prevent speech." 
Aquest liguament le qual ve dejos la lengua alcunas veguadas o es natural am le qual hom nays, o accidental e accideys per plagua la qual ja es consolidada.	Aquest ligament le qual ve dejos la lengua alcunas veguadas o es natural am le qual hom nays, o accidental e accideys per plagua la cual ja es consolidada. 
E la operacio en lu es que huobres la boca del malaute, le sieu cap existent en le tieu se; e eleva la sieua lengua, e aprop inscideys aquel liament nervos segon la latitut entro que sia solvuda la lengua de la sua recencio.	Here is the translation of the provided text:
Mays si en aquela es alcuna duricia o denodacio, e aquo es stat per consolidacio de plagua, lahoras tu gieta unci e scindeys aquel per la latitut entro que aias inscindit le liament e sia dissolvuda la nodacio.	Mays si en aquella es alcuna duricia o denodacio, e aquo es stat per consolidacio de plagua, lahoras tu gieta unci e scindeys aquel per la latitut entro que aias inscindit le liament e sia dissolvuda la nodacio.
E guarda te que no sia fayta fissura en le preon de la carn e que scindas aqui arceria e vengua flux de sanc.	And make sure that there is no crack in the bone of the flesh, and that you do not break here any artery or vein from which blood flows.
E aprop sia lavat le vestigi de la inscisio am ayguaros o am vi agre o am aygua frega; e aprop pausa dejos la lengua licini; so es meca la qual tengua le malaute dejos la lengua en quascuna nuoyt per so que no sia consolidat autra veguada.	Then wash the traces of the incision with warm water or with vinegar or with lukewarm water; and then place a linen cloth underneath; it is necessary that the patient has the tongue outside every night so that it does not become fixed in another position.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, pausa sobre le loc vetriol trissat; mays si le sanc ventz, lahoras cauteriza le loc am cauteri lantiginos le qual conveneys ad aquo.	But if there is a flow of blood, place powdered vitriol over the spot; but if the blood keeps coming out, then cauterize the area with a hot iron that is suitable for this.
E aprop aquel cura am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	Then treat him with other appropriate remedies until he is healed.

De extraccio de ranula dejos la lengua.	On the removal of the salivary gland from under the tongue." 
Alcunas veguadas accideys dejos la lengua apostema asemblant a nomla petita prohibent la lengua de la sua operacio natural; e fort leu es magnificada entro que huempla la boca.	Alcunas veguadas accideys dejos la lengua apostema asemblant a nomla petita prohibent la lengua de la sua operacio natural; e fort leu es magnificada entro que huempla la boca.
E la operacio en lu es que huebras la boca del malaute sesent devant le solel e considera le apostema.	And during the operation, you should open the patient's mouth towards the sun and examine the abscess.
E si tu le vezes de fusca color o de negra, dur, al qual le malaute no atroba sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel quar es cranc.	If you see an abscess that is dark in colour, hard, and the patient does not feel it, then do not touch or disturb it.
E si es declinat a blancor, en le qual es humiditat, lahoras tu met le onci en lu, e inscideys aquel am spatum subtil, e inscindeys le de tota partida; e si sanc te ventz en la hora de la tua operacio, lahoras tu pausa desus zegi trissat, so es vetriol, entro que sia restreyt le sanc.	But if it has started to turn white and is moist, you should put your thumb on it, then carefully incise it with a fine spatula, cut it open completely; and if blood appears while you are operating, then apply powdered gypsum (or sulphuric acid) until the bleeding stops.
E aprop retorna a la obra tua entro que lo haias trayt am compliment de lu, entro que sia lavat am vi agre e sal; e cura aquel am l’autra curacio ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	Then return to your work until it is properly treated with ointment, and afterwards wash it with vinegar and salt; then treat it again with water until it is completely healed.

De extraccio de apostema de doas aurelhas e de aquel que es nada en le golayro e de las autras apostemas.	On the extraction of abscesses from both ears and that which is found in the neck, as well as other types of abscesses." 
Quan endeveno en le golayro godat, so son glandulas las quals son asembladas algodat, las quals accideysso deforas e son nompnadas doas aurelhas, las quals quan tu las curas am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no es sanat, lahoras tu considera si le apostema es dur, de fusca color, de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E si es de roga color e la razic es grossa, lahoras no toques aquela am ferr per le flux del sanc; abantz layssa aquel entro sia madurat, e lahoras o tu trauqueras aquel, o sira romput per si.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E si es de blanqua color, radon, e la razit de lu es subtil, lahoras aquel es que cove esser inscidit.	And if it is of a white color, soft, and its root is delicate, then it should be incised.
E la operacio en lu es que consideras, denant la tua operacio, si ja ha repausat le apostema de lu caut am repaus complit o si es deminuit am alcuna deminucio; e lahoras fay sezer le malaute denant le soleyl, e·l cap de lu sia en le tieu se, e huebre la boca de lu, e le servidor prenent entre las suas mas prema la lengua de lu dejos am instrument mot noble del qual aquesta es la forma:	And before the operation on him is performed, consider whether the abscess has completely matured or if it has diminished to some degree. Then expose the patient to sunlight with their head facing yours; open his mouth and have the assistant hold his tongue using this fine instrument which is shaped as follows:
E sia fayt de argent o de aram, e sia subtil cum cotel.	And it should be made of silver or steel, and be as thin as a knife.
Donc cum tu premes am aquel la lengua e es mostrat a tu la apostema, e catz sobre aquel le tieu vezement, lahoras pren onci e fica aquel en l’amenla, e tira aquel a las partidas defora tant quant podes.	So as you press with it against his tongue and the abscess is shown to you, then take care and place this instrument in your left hand, and pull the abscess outward as much as possible.
Otra aquo que tiras alcuna causa de las tunicas, e aprop incideys aquela am instrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	After pulling out some of the membranes with it, then proceed to make an incision using this particular tool:
e es asemblat a forceps, empero las extramitatz de lu son corvadas, ayssi que l’orrifici de quascuna de aquelas es en le endreyt del autra, mot agudas, le qual sia de ferr indi enbegut.	It resembles forceps but its ends are curved so that the holes in each of them are facing one another, very sharp and made out of tempered iron.
Mays si aquest instrument no es a tu present, lahoras inscideys aquel am spatum del qual aquesta es la forma de lu: E sia agut de la una part, no agut del autra part.	Mays si aquest instrument no es a tu present, lahoras inscideys aquel am spatum del cual aquesta es la forma de lu: E sia agut de la una part, no agut del autra part.
E pus que has inscidit una mella, inscideys l’autra segon aquesta meteyssa manieyra de inscizio, e aprop la inscizio le malaute guarguarise de aygua frega	And after you have incised one wound, incision of the other must be done according to this same manner of incision, and then the patient will recover from a cold humor.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, guarguarise aygua de decoccio de scorsa de milgrana o de fuelha de mirtra e semblantz ad aquel de las causas stiptiquas entro que·l flux del sanc sia restreyt, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	But if there is a flow of blood, the patient will recover from water resulting from boiling pomegranate rind or myrtle leaf and similar to the causes that can stop that flow of blood, and then treat what has been healed.
E alcunas veguadas naysso en le guolayro autras apostemas otra aquelas doas aurelhas, e inscideys aquelas segon que yeu e dit en la inscizio de doas mellas engualment.	And sometimes you will find abscesses in the earlobe and other parts of the ear; incision must be made there as well.
E yeu ja fu medicat una femna de apostema le qual era nat en le golayro de lu, le qual apostema tendia a color fusca, de pauc sentiment, le qual ja havia claus le golayro de lu, e la femna respirava am meat streyt, e ja havia prohibit a lu comestio e beure de aygua, e ja era pervenguda a la mort si mays agues stat per un dia o per dos.	I have treated a woman with an abscess that had appeared on her earlobe; the abscess was turning dark in colour and caused little pain. It had closed over her earlobe, making it difficult for her to breathe, and I had prohibited her from eating or drinking water. She would have died within one or two days if left untreated.
E l’apostema ja tant havia pugat que havia mezes dos ramps entro que eyssiro per dos traucs.	The abscess had become so severe that it had spread two branches through the skin.
Donc yeu me cuytegui fisturalment e fiquegui en un de lor onci, e tiregui aquel, e atirada es de lu gran porcio, e aprop yeu incidigui aquela de on comprendegui del autre trau, e aprop yeu obrigui la boca de lu, e compremegui la sua lengua, e aprop yeu fiquegui le onci en aquela apostema.	So I treated it surgically and inserted a fistula into one of its branches; I removed what was there, taking out a large portion of the abscess. Then, I incised the area from which the other branch originated, forced open his mouth, pressed down on his tongue, and placed the fistula in that abscess.
E aprop yeu abscizi gran partida de lu, e no corria de lu sino un pauc de sanc.	And then I made a large incision into him, and only a small amount of blood flowed from the wound.
Donc absolut es le guolayro de aquela femna, e comensec tantost beure aygua, e aprop presec vianda, donc yeu no cessegui inscidir de aquela apostema motas vetz per lonc temps, e succesia apostema en loc de aquel, le qual inscizia entro que es prolonguat aquel.	So the whole ulcer of that woman was the vulva, and she started to drink water and eat food. I did not stop incising that abscess many times over a long period, and an abscess would form in place of that one, which I continued to incision.
Donc yeu engen agui e cauterizegui le guolayro de lu, donc astec de addicio; e aprop yeu perambulegui e no saubi que fec Dieus de aquela aprop mi.	I brought fire there and cauterized her vulva, then I left; and I walked around and did not know what God had done to me afterwards.

De inscizio de huvela quan es apostemada.	On incising a swollen testicle when it is abscessed." 
Quan catarr deysen a la huvula, e es apostemada e es longa, lahoras ela es nompnada perpendicular; e si es en la partida dejos grossa e redonda, e lahoras ela es apelada buba.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
Mays quan es curada am aquo que havem dit en la divisio, e no comfereys la tua curacio, e eyssament ja vezes que apostema caut ja es ostat de lu e es subtil, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquela que es agreguadas redonda; e si es ad aquela longitut, e es sanguina, de fusca color o de negre, e no es a lu centiment, lahoras cove que tu temtes la inscizio de lu, quar en aquela es temor sobre le malaute.	Here is the translation of your provided source sentence: 
E quan tu vezes aquela segon la manieyra que yeu he dita de la sua blancor e longuesa, que tu fassas sezer le malaute e premas la lengua de lu am instrument del qual procesic la sua forma e aprop fica le onci en la nuva, e tira aquela en jos e inscideys aquela am un de dos instrumentz les quals e ditz en la inscizio de dos mellas.	When you observe it as described above with its whiteness and length, stop the patient's speech and press their tongue down with an instrument that corresponds to its shape; then place a sponge in the mouth, pull the tongue downward, and incise it using one of two instruments which are mentioned below for the procedure of double melling.
E cove que no inscidas aquela sino aquo que es ajustat sobre le terme natural ses addicio, quar si tu inscides de lu mays, lediyras le sieu parlar.	Be careful not to incise it beyond the natural boundary without addition, for if you cut deeper, you will take away their ability to speak.
E aprop la inscizio, usa de aquo le qual havem recomtat en la inscizio de dos mellas, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	Then for the incision, use one of those we mentioned earlier for the procedure of double melling, and treat it until it is healed.
Mays si era le malaute espaventat per la inscizio de lu, cove que use de engen en la cauterizacio de lu ses temor, e la manieyra del cauteri en lu no es sino am aygua aguda, e es que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se, e aprop prem la lengua de lu am le instrument le qual havem dit, e aprop pren de l’aygua la qual havem dita en le capitol de cauterizacio, e comfeys am aquela caus viva, e pausa aquela no spessa ni subtil, e de aquela omple la concavitat de l’estrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	However, if the patient is frightened by their incision, be mindful to employ skill in cauterizing them without fear. The manner of cauterization should not involve hot water; instead, place the patient's head on your lap and press their tongue down with the aforementioned instrument. Then take some of the water we mentioned earlier in our chapter on cauterization, mix it with live coals, and dip this into a receptacle that has this shape:
Sia la extramitat de lu conquavitat en la qual sia pausada la medicina ayssi cum la conquavitat de culher de ray, e pausa le strument am la medicina sobre la vula, e·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu latz per so que corro saliva o musellage de la boca de aquel per la intrinscequa medicina, per so que no deyssenda de aquela deguna causa sobre le golayro de lu e que ledesca aquel.	Let the tip of this cavity in which you place the medicine have the same shape as that of a spoon's bowl; then put the instrument with the medicine on their tongue, and let them lie on their side so saliva or spittle from their mouth runs out due to the intrinsic power of the medicine. This ensures nothing harmful drips down onto their gullet and chokes them.
E aprop te la tua ma am la medicina, e exprem aquela sobre la uvula per l’espazi de miega hora entro que vegas aquela esser denegrada e sedada per la mordicacio de la medicina.	And then place your hand on the medicine and squeeze it onto the tonsil for half an hour until you see that the tonsil has become blackened and swollen due to the medicine's action.
E si vols, prengues coto e envolopes aquel sobre la extremitat del ray, e submergeys le coto en la medicina, e entrometas le ray am le coto en una canula de sobre entro que·l coto adheresca en aquela canula, e fay aquo tantas vetz entro que consiegues aquo que vols de la cauterizacio de la uva, e aprop leyssa aquela quar ela se seccara e cayra aprop tres dias o quatre.	If you wish, take hold of the affected area and wrap it with a cloth over the end of your finger; submerge this cloth in the medicine, and insert your finger, covered by the cloth, into a tube so that the cloth adheres to its interior wall. Do this several times until you achieve what you want from the cauterization process on the tonsil. Then leave it be for three or four days as it dries out and falls away.
E si indigeysses que iteras la medicina, itera aquela, e aprop la cauterizacio abstergeys en le circuit de la uva am coto enbegut en boder, e mondifica am aquel aquo que es en le circuit de lu de la medicina, e sia lavat am aygua frega, e sia curat deforo am embrocacio, e dedintz am guarguarismes entro que sia sanat.	And if you need to repeat the medicine application, do so. Then cleanse the cauterization around the tonsil with a piece of linen dipped in warm water and clean it all over with the medicine; be sure also to wash it externally with an ointment and internally with gargles until it is healed.
E aquesta especia de curacio es pus salva que inscizio e pus long de temor.	This type of treatment is safer than incision surgery, although more prolonged in terms of fear.
Alcunas veguadas es curada la uvuola am aquo que es pus subtil que cauteri e inscizio, quar es curat am subfumigacio en aquesta manieyra: recipe calament, ysop, origua, ruda, scicados arabic, camamilla, broyda e semblant ad aquels de las erbas, e ajusta totas aquelas causas, o alcunas de lor, en una ola, e sian submergidas am vi agre, e bulhan; e la ola sia be lutada am lut decentment, e sia en le mieg loc de la ola un trauc, sobre le qual sia pausat un instrument conquau de aram segon aquesta manieyra; sia fayt de argent o de aram.	Some cases of tonsil inflammation are cured with something more gentle than cauterization or incision surgery: take yarrow, hyssop, tansy, wormwood, Arabian styrax, camomile, broom, and other similar herbs; pound all these together in a mortar, or just some of them if you wish. Let it be steeped in strong vinegar until it bubbles over. The jar should have been well sealed with decent pitch, and there should be an opening in the middle where this instrument is placed. It can be made of silver or brass.
E sia entromesa la extremitat en la boca del malaute entro que la vapor poge a la uvula sobre la quanula, entro que la uvula sia mot ofuscada.	E sia entromesa la extremitat en la boca del malaute entro que la vapor poge a la uvula sobre la quanula, entro que la uvula sia mot ofuscada.
E aprop itera sobre aquela motas veguadas entro qu’es secca, e guarda te que no fassas aquesta curacio al comesament de l’aveniment de apostemas, quar trop ajustaria en le apostema, e no cove que tu fassas aquo, sino deves la declaracio de apostema de lu caut.	And then repeat the process on those spots that have turned white and are dry, making sure you do not perform this treatment at the initial stage of abscess formation as it would be too intense for the abscess, and it is not appropriate to do so; instead, you should wait until the abscess has been lanced.
Mays si no es a tu present aquest instrument, lahoras pren una cana e compon en la extramitat de lu un clos de huou, per so que la boca del malaute sia comborida, quar le closc del huou prohibeys la vapor comburir la boca.	However, if you do not have this instrument at your disposal, take a reed and attach a quill to its end, so that the patient's mouth can be closed, as the quill prevents vapors from escaping the mouth.
E aquesta curacio es bona am salut.	And this treatment is beneficial for their health.

De extraccio d’espinas e de aquo que adhereys en le golayro e de las autras causas.	On the extraction of spines or foreign objects embedded in the throat, and other similar cases." 
Motas veguadas adhereys en le guolayro o spina de peys o alcuna autra causa.	Motas veguadas adhereys en le guolayro o spina de peys o alcuna autra causa. 
Adonc cove que tu extraguas aquo que de aquels es apparent, sobre le qual catz la vista, pus que tu premes la lengua am instrument denant solelh, per so que a tu sia declarat aquo que es en la guola.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E aquo que no apar e es a tu occultat en le guolayro, cove que tu fassas vomir le malaute denant que la vianda sia degerida en l’estomac, quar fort leu la causa annexsa le golayro sira foro-getada per vomit; o que deglusia le malaute una pessa de nap o de razit de laytuga o un boci de pa sec; o prengua una pessa de sponga marina sequa leon, e lia aquela fortment am fiel, e aprop le malaute transglussia aquela, quar cum perve al loc en le qual so spinas e es extrahuda, lahoras so foro-getatz.
